metadata.title: CVE-2019-19725 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
sysstat through 12.2.0 has a double free in check_file_actlst insa_common.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19725` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

isag - 11.2.0-1ubuntu0.3
sysstat - 11.2.0-1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sysstat package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.0-1ubuntu0.3').
